Description: Black-topped beaker vase with narrow body and flaring rim, coated on exterior with red and blackened slip and burnished.
Curator's comments: Like Black-top B23b in Petrie’s Corpus of Prehistoric pottery For excavations see: E. R. Ayrton & W. L. S. Loat, Pre-dynastic cemetery at El Mahasna (London, 1911).
Condition: fair : salt damaged on exterior, half of rim missing, base worn.
